title: maddu mADalariye
sahitya:
maddu mADalariye muddu ramAdEvi


anupallavi

  muddu bAlakrSNanali mana siddhavAgi nilluvante


caraNam 1    vacanagaLella vAsudEvana katheyendu racane mADuvalli rakti nillO hAge
    caraNam 2    sante nerahida sati sutaru tannavaremba bhrAnti biTTu nishcintanAkO hAge
    caraNam 3    ennoDeya siri purandara viTTalanna sanmatiyinda nA hADi pADO hAge
